text.section: To the full extent that the Constitution and laws of the United States allow, the Commission has jurisdiction over each public service company that engages in or operates a utility business in the State and over motor carrier companies as provided in Title 9 of this article.

section.section: The Commission has the powers specifically conferred by law.
The Commission has the implied and incidental powers needed or proper to carry out its functions under this division.

text.section: The powers of the Commission shall be construed liberally.
